favourite.article: This song is so beautiful. I really love the words.
I went to bed last night with parts of this song on my mind. I had to find it today. It is so true and beautiful.
I love this hymn. I grew up listen to my grandmother sing it and other around our house.
Oh, how happy our heart will be made! ... Yes, Lord. I love You, Lord!!
I love this song, when I sing it at church at alter call it just give me a sweet feeling.
Am here to laid my all at the altar.
Lord, thank You for awakening me with this song in my heart.
I thank the Lord for reminding me of this song today...
Lord, I thank You for putting this song in my spirit today.
Thank You Holy Spirit for raising this song of Zion up from within me today.

Thank you and God bless you for making this beautiful hymn available. I love this hymn for the truth it brings out so clearly - esp. in this day and age when sacrifice is shadowed under the influence of selfishness and wickedness.
